answers.answer: Mine is always high when iI go to the doc but they haven't done anything about it as if yet, i guess it isn't to alarming....I think mine goes up becayse
Ugh...lol goes up because I get major anxiety at every appointment I don't know why.....    :(
I have had high blood pressure will all my kids and now in pregnant again I have it I got a new doctor and he put me on meds right away so yes it can be controlled

Mine has gotten progressively higher at each visit. There is a protein that shows in your urine if it is pre eclampsia. They check me at every visit but I dont have it. The most important thing is to remain calm! The higher your bp is the more stress it puts on your and the babies body. Im sure they will do lab work on you and keep a close eye. If you start to get dizzy or have unbearable headaches youll need to check that blood pressure right away and if it is high head to the hospital. If you dont have sympyoms like that just take it easy and relax. Stress is your enemy now

What is your BP. Mines always high my midwife sent me to hospital aFirst few times but.nothing ever came back of it. My midwife said.if.I ever get.pains under my breastso and just above my ribs.and black dots in my vision that's when to worry about preeclampsia. If your worried go your gp and ask to check ur urine for protein
Thank you ladies I appreciate your comments, I am going to the Dr to talk about it.These are my results for the blood pressureRight arm; 154/92 & again 153/92Left arm; 144/91 & again 139/90

I've had high blood pressure with both my pregnancies. My first, it just stayed high blood pressure and I was monitored twice weekly. This pregnancy I have protein in my urine so I have preeclampsia, so again I have to be monitored twice weekly and also get my blood drawn once a week and take a baby aspirin once a day and I'm getting induced at 37 weeks. So if they're concerned, they'll just watch you closely :) Don't stress, try to take it easy. I'd just talk to your doc to see what they're going to do.

I'm currently being monitored for pre e but my bp had gone up. when ever I went to Dr appt they always had to retake it like 3 or 4 times before they were ok with it.might be induced tomorrow night depending on the results.

I had my son at 35wks due to preeclamplsia. My bp was 170/140 but they were able to manage it for 7wks with bp meds before he stopped growing and I was very ill. This time they were watching for it and they picked it up at 15wks with bp 160/90. They believe they can manage it again and are hoping to get me to 35wks.

Stay away from research first off. Causes anxiety which can lead to high blood pressure. If a doctor was not alarmed by it usually means nothing. Trust your doctor. If you can't get a different doc or midwife.

question: Yesterday they took my blood pressure 6 times! It was so high, so I read up about it. It can cause preeclampsia! I am freaking out, does anyone have high blood pressure and can it be controlled while pregnant!?
title: Does anyone have high blood pressure? I'm scared :(
